member.name: M:RosanicSocial.API.Controllers.v1.CommentController.GetComment(RosanicSocial.Domain.DTO.Request.Comment.CommentGetRequest)
member.summary: GET, gets the comment that specified with CommentGetRequest

member.name: M:RosanicSocial.API.Controllers.v1.TokenController.GenerateNewAccessToken(RosanicSocial.Domain.Models.TokenModel)
member.summary: It Generates new access token for user to authenticate. If the supplied token meets the requirements, it generates a new one. refreshToken's expiration date must not be out of date and the supplied refreshToken is have to be equavalent to user's refreshToken in Identity Database
